|rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9103; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware=== ====Info==== 
Architecture:	MIPS
Vendor:		Lantiq
Bootloader:	U-Boot
System-On-Chip:	Lantiq Danube-S PSB 50712 (MIPS 24Kec)
CPU/Speed:	333 MHz Dual Core
NOR Flash:	Spansion S29AL004D 512KiB
NAND Flash:	Samsung K9F5608U0D-JIB0 32MiB
RAM Chip:	Samsung K4H511638F
RAM Specs:	64 MiB
Wireless:	Atheros 9160-BC1A 802.11b/g/n, 
		pci, 0x18000000, irq 22
Ethernet:	Infineon AD9669I
USB:		Yes
DECT:		SiTel SC14488
SLIC:	Teridian 73m1966, Infineon Vinetic PEF4268F 
        Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter
Serial:		Yes
JTAG:		?
